data.title: Engil Renewing: Revenue, Competitors, Alternatives
data.meta_description: Mota-Engil Renewing top competitors are Vasco da Gama CoLAB - Energy Storage, SES and Helexia Portugal and they have annual revenue of N/A  and 27  employees.
data.text:
Renewing is the cleantech of the Mota-Engil Group and its mission is to accelerate the energy transition and decarbonization of urban centers, companies and industry.

It develops, finances and exploits sustainable energy and mobility solutions, making it possible, through the energy transition, to strengthen the competitiveness of its clients, reduce their energy costs and increase their renewable energy autonomy, accelerating their decarbonization and carbon neutrality. 

In the area of energy, the focus is on decentralization through solutions such as solar self-consumption and renewable energy communities. 

In mobility, it develops electric charging solutions for UVEs in general as well as for companies, promoting the electric transition of their fleets.

Renewing seeks to establish strategic decarbonization partnerships with its clients, with whom it shares the financial, environmental and social benefits of the projects it implements.

Based in Portugal, it develops international projects with a focus on the geographical markets where the Group operates - Europe, Latin America and Africa.
